ml_app.train

Classes

Model

A machine learning model for classifying the Iris dataset using the K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN) algorithm.

Module Contents

class ml_app.train.Model(test_size=0.5)[source]

A machine learning model for classifying the Iris dataset using the K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN) algorithm.

dataset[source]

The name of the dataset used (‘iris’).

Type:

str

architecture[source]

The name of the model architecture (‘KNN’).

Type:

str

features

List of feature names used in the dataset.

Type:

list

labels

List of target labels for the dataset.

Type:

list

_train_data

Tuple containing training data (X_train, y_train).

Type:

tuple

_eval_data

Tuple containing evaluation data (X_test, y_test).

Type:

tuple

model

The trained KNN model.

Type:

KNeighborsClassifier

eval

Accuracy score of the model on the evaluation dataset.

Type:

float

__call__(data)[source]

Predicts the labels for the given data.

_init_data(test_size)[source]

Initializes and splits the Iris dataset into training and evaluation sets.

_score()[source]

Evaluates the model and returns the accuracy score.

_train(test_size)[source]

Trains the KNN model using the Iris dataset.

dataset = 'iris'[source]
architecture = 'KNN'[source]
__call__(data)[source]

Predicts labels for the given input data using the trained model.

Parameters:

  • data (list of list of float/int) – The input data records to predict. Each record should have the same number

  • on. (of features as the model was trained)

Yields:

str – Predicted label for each input data record.

Raises:

ValueError – If the input data record is malformed (i.e., incorrect number of features or non-numeric values).

_init_data(test_size=0.5)[source]

Loads the Iris dataset and splits it into training and evaluation sets.

Parameters:

test_size (float, optional) – Proportion of the dataset to be used for testing. Default is 0.5.

Attributes set:

features (list): List of feature names from the Iris dataset. labels (list): List of target labels from the Iris dataset. _train_data (tuple): Training data (X_train, y_train). _eval_data (tuple): Evaluation data (X_test, y_test).

_score()[source]

Evaluates the trained model using the evaluation dataset and calculates the accuracy score.

Returns:

Accuracy score of the model on the evaluation dataset.

Return type:

float

_train(test_size=0.5)[source]

Initializes the data and trains the KNN model on the training dataset.

Parameters:

test_size (float, optional) – Proportion of the dataset to be used for testing. Default is 0.5.

Sets the attributes:

model (KNeighborsClassifier): Trained KNN model. eval (float): Accuracy score of the model on the evaluation dataset.
